overview: Director Watanabe Kunio  The first talkie film by Tamagawa Studio  Starring  Sugi Kyoji as Hosoi  Ichikawa Haruyo as Kinuko  Hoshi Reiko as Mitsuko  Matsumoto Shutaro as boy of liquor shop  Uemura Setsuko as landlord widow  Kitahara Natsue as hysteric wife  Oosaki Kenji as her husband  Matsudaira Akira as singer at next door  Hanano Kuniko as maid  Kawagoe Ippei and Bando Mieshi as old couple  Kanbe Hikaru as thief
title: Diary of a Bride
